heading: swatch preps email watch
subheading: the swiss company is working on a wristwatch capable of accessing email wirelessly from a special mousepad.
author: leander kahney
text: swatch, the swiss watchmaker, is preparing a new timepiece that can access email, the company said monday. the swatch access wristwatch, expected to be available later this year, will read email by communicating wirelessly with a special mousepad.according to swatch officials, the mousepad will be fitted with a sensor capable of detecting nearby swatch access watches.identifying the wearer using a personal identification number stored on the watch, the mousepad will download the email before beaming it to the watch.the system will provide email access from any machine fitted with a swatch access mousepad, the company said.the swatch access watch and mousepad will cost about us$125 and will work with either macs or pcs, a swatch spokeswoman said.
